name: aura-sdk
description: Aura Chat Widget SDK - Embeddable chat widget for Aura

scripts.minify: uglifyjs sdk.js --compress --mangle --warn --output sdk.min.js && npm run version:add
scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f sdk.min.js && npm run minify
scripts.version:add:
echo "/*! Ringover AI Chat SDK v$(npm run version:extract --silent) Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S') */
$(cat sdk.min.js)" > sdk.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
